attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why has Mr Brown just pledged British tax payers' money to Gaza, when our country is suffering a huge recession and the Palestinians are the very same people who supported Saddam's invasion of Kuwait, that support rockets and suicide attacks, that started the Lebanese civil war, that tried to overthrow the Jordanian monarchy, that have killed athletes and that have hijacked planes?

Also, as Gazans starve and electricity generators run out of fuel, how come Hamas fighters have food, uniforms, guns, ammunitions, rockets and petrol for their pickup trucks?

Think about it.
